short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A modern, highly customisable New Tab page with many widgets that does not require any permissions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon breathes new life into your new tab page. Gone are the days of bland boring new tabs - take back control of your tabs and have it your way.

Includes features like
- Weather
- Backgrounds provided by Unsplash
- Custom Bookmarks bar
- Ability to change the behaviour yourself via custom CSS

and so much more!
